verbose_text: We have recently reported that transcutaneous application of carbon dioxide (CO 2) increases mitochondrial biogenesis in skeletal muscle 29 and that CO 2 therapy induces mitochondrial apoptosis with mitochondrial proliferation via PGC-1alpha expression in human malignant fibrous histiocytoma (MFH) 30.
evidence: carbon dioxide (CO 2 ) increases mitochondrial biogenesis in skeletal muscle 29  and that CO 2  therapy induces mitochondrial apoptosis
